document_data.name: Hospice of Marthammor
document_data.mainbody: The '''Hospice of Marthammor''' was a sanctuary for travelers run by [[dwarven]] servants of the [[Morndinsamman|dwarf deity]] [[Marthammor Duin]], in the [[Old Delzoun]] region of [[Luruar]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. It was led by Observer [[Kerrilla Gemstar]], who provided healing and lodging for her guests, though not without cost.
document_data.Location: The church was located about two miles (3.2 km) northwest of the town of [[Deadsnows]], along the [[Deadsnows Track]].
document_data.Accommodations: The Hospice regularly had five to ten guests a night, but could provide lodging for up to twenty. In the summer days during the region's gold rush, the hospice was almost always full.

Services.Duties: Along with the worshipers of [[Lathander]] from [[the Morning Watchtower]], Observer Gemstar and her clergy within the hospice kept a keen eye on activity around the [[Ironhand Mines]]. Within these old depths was an entrance to the [[Underdark]], and a temple of [[Shar]] known as the [[Well of Darkness]].
